resources.string: Here is the main screen for listening to songs.
Register function hasn\'t been implemented yet
Login function hasn\'t been implemented yet

Here is an album list screen. You can add an album to the playlist (the \'Add to playlist\' button, the \'Play list\' screen should be implemented) or play the selected album by clicking on the \'Play\' button.

Click on \'Read more\' and then you will be move to resources available on the web.
This is a music store, you can search for albums, read album information by pressing the \'info\' button, and you can also buy an album by pressing the \'basket\' button.

The player will work on the integration with Spotify API by using Spotify Android SDK. The Spotify Android SDK makes it easy to add Spotify functionality to your Android app. The SDK contains two small footprint binary libraries packaged as Android archives (AAR): Spotify Authentication Library and Spotify Player Library. You will be able to sign in or create an account from within the app. An additional option would be logging in via a Facebook and Google account
Song will be repeated once playback of all songs complete
Function not implemented. Intent is missing to open the browser
Thanks you for buying this song, please enjoy
